select SEQ_COURSE_NO.nextval from dual
insert into course values (#{courseNo}, #{userNo}, #{title}, #{distance}, #{courseCate}, #{courseTime}, #{difficulty}, sysdate, #{openStatus})
mapper.select: select course_no courseNo ,user_no userNo ,title ,distance ,course_category courseCate ,course_time courseTime ,difficulty ,to_char(reg_date, 'YYYY.MM.DD') regDate from course where course_no = #{courseNo}

select c.course_no, title, distance, course_time, course_category, difficulty, id, p.order_no, x, y from course c, users u, point p, (select max(order_no) order_no, course_no from point p group by course_no) mp where c.user_no = u.user_no and c.course_no = p.course_no and (p.order_no = 0 or (p.course_no = mp.course_no and p.order_no = mp.order_no)) and x > #{x} - 9 and x < #{x} + 9 and y > #{y} - 6 and y < #{y} + 6

select c.course_no, title, distance, course_time, course_category, difficulty, id, p.order_no, x, y from course c, users u, point p, (select max(order_no) order_no, course_no from point p group by course_no) mp where c.user_no = u.user_no and c.course_no = p.course_no and (p.order_no = 0 or (p.course_no = mp.course_no and p.order_no = mp.order_no)) and keyword like '%#{keyword}%'
